channel.title: <?> How To Change Admin/Mod <?>
channel.description: I Wanted To Know If Its Possible To Change The Name Of Mod And Admin EG: If Your Mod -- Your Weird. If Your Admin -- You Rock I Have Fr33sc4p3 and On The Top It Has A Interface So I Wanted The "Players On - " To "You Are A - __"And The ___ Would Mean If Your Weird Or Something...? Does Anyone How?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2007, 09:16:28 AM[/size][hr]Please Or If Your Admin OR Mod The Text Can Say If Your Admin Or Mod?

item.title: <?> How To Change Admin/Mod <?>
item.dc:creator: @goneby1233 goneby1233
item.description:
@goneby1233 wrote:

[quote=“rs w00dcut, post:2, topic:130531”]What text are you talking about,when you log in and in chat box it says things?[/quote] No Look

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @red@~@whi@F@red@r@gre@3@cya@3@whi@s@red@c@gre@4@cya@p@whi@3@red@~", 6570); sendFrame126("@yel@Owner=@whi@Fr33sc4p3", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

Like I Want To Replace Players On - With: You Are: " " And In The " " It Would Say If Your Weird Or Cool, Weird Would Be For Mod And Cool Would Be For Admin?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2007, 09:40:22 AM[/size][hr]you know what… whats the thing for what playerrights you have? like +playerRights??? what is it? thnkx

Read full topic
